SEARCH
Package ProjectApplication

Class ProjectApplicationController

java.lang.Object
ProjectApplication.ProjectApplicationController
public class ProjectApplicationController extends Object
Controller class for managing project applications. Handles logic for creating, updating, withdrawing, and displaying applications based on roles such as Manager, Officer, and Applicant.

      projectID - the ID of the project to apply for
      roomType - the room type chosen

      Returns:
      true if application is successfully created

    • withdrawApplication

      public static boolean withdrawApplication(String applicantID)
      Withdraws the active application of an applicant. If the status is BOOKED, reverts the unit count.
      Parameters:
      applicantID - the ID of the applicant
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public static boolean rejectWithdrawal(String applicationID)
      Reverts the withdrawal of an application by restoring its previous status. Adjusts unit counts if necessary.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - the ID of the application
      Returns:
      true if successful
